amendment.description: To require a report on the reconstruction of Iraq.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1312 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1312 proposed by Senator Inouye for Senator Wyden. (consideration: CR S9566-9569; text: CR S9567) To require a report on the reconstruction of Iraq.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1312 proposed by Senator Inouye for Senator Wyden.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1312 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
